title: Executive Manager
subTitle: Digital Marketing
rawHtml:
BacBon Limited

BacBon Limited has been established as a Social Enterprise in 2013.The aim of the company is to feat the modern ICT innovation for the enhancement of the quality education of Bangladesh and reduce gap between rural and urban area by ensuring access to quality education for all.



Vacancy: 01

Job Responsibilities
  • Creative planning and execution of all the digital marketing campaign, including a good Graphics Designing Knowledge.

  • Expertise on Social Media platforms marketing, Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Google Ad-Sense, manage digital marketing campaigns and YouTube marketing.

  • Analysis and Write content for SEO and Social networking accounts. Create and edit posts, videos and other content.

  • Keyword research and competitor analysis regularly and identify the new opportunities for increasing organic reach.

  • Use Google Analytics, Google AdWords, Content readability test site, Keyword planner and other relevant sites, drive traffic to company pages & App.

  • Provide creative ideas for content marketing and update company website, Create and manage link building strategies, content marketing strategies.

  • Work on the Search Engine Optimization (SEO) of the website(s), be actively involved in SEO efforts (keyword, link building).

  • Create Banners, Images, Promotions etc. to be displayed on the website, Social Media and Email Marketing.

  • Able to maintain co-operative and close relationship with old clients and develop new customers through professional caliber.

  • Must have experience in Database Marketing: E-mailers & Bulk SMS activities to generate leads.

  • Prepare and type all sorts of documents in Bangla and English at least 2 years practical experience (MS Word, Excel, MS PowerPoint, MS Access Database).

  • Must have fast typing skill in Bangla & English

  • Submit daily work reports, on a regular basis.

  • Must be able to work under constant deadline pressure.




Educational Requirements
  • Graduation running/completed from reputed university.

  • Training/Trade Course: Graphics Design, Digital Marketing, App Store Optimization (ASO) and SEO (from any reputed training center like BASIS, BITM, BCC etc.).

  • Preferred Professional Certification: Google AdWords certification, Google Analytics Certification, Facebook Certified Planning Professional.

  • Skills Required: Administration, Adobe Photoshop/ Illustrator, Graphic Designer.




Experience Requirements

The applicants should have experience in the following area(s): Corporate Sales, Digital Sales and Marketing, Good Computer Skills, Strong graphic design skills.




Employment Status

Part Time (Internship)




Workplace
  • Work from home

  • 2 days physical office

  • Weekly effective 24-32 hours



Job Location

Banasree, Dhaka



Salary

Negotiable



Application Deadline

15 Aug, 2020



Company Information

BacBon Limited

Address: House# 13 (5th Floor), Block #C, Main Road, Banasree, Rampura, Dhaka-1219.
